array.string: Wizards give you extra energy regeneration. Keep them alive!
Try to keep your energy below full. Energy regeneration is wasted while at full energy!
Spells that heal more slowly are more energy efficient. Use them when damage is low.
Try to find your next healing target while casting spells.
Curses and Poisons can be removed from allies by using Purify.
When healing a Guardian that is already at full health it gives the Guardian a small damage absorption effect.
Warlocks will heal themselves slowly when they are at low health.
If you find yourself not using a spell during a fight, try replacing it with something else next time.
Targets that are Focused are vital to survival. Make sure they stay healthy!
Make sure to read about the enemy abilities by tapping on the icons beneath the enemy health bar.
No spell is always better than another. Use the right spells in the right situations.
Divinity allows you to enhance your abilities in special ways.
You can earn gold from repeating enemies you've already defeated.
Gold earned from Multiplayer battles is doubled.
Buy spells in the shop to unlock more spell categories.
